samzong/hf-model-downloader

GUI for downloading Hugging Face and ModelScope models

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Downloads models and datasets from Hugging Face via terminal or web interface
  • Collection of PyTorch image models, training scripts, and utilities
  • GUI for command line tools to download media
  • 3D model viewer for displaying glTF and GLB files in Obsidian vaults
  • Downloads video and audio from websites via yt-dlp
  • Generates 3D models from images on Windows
  • Downloads files with a progress bar
  • Downloads Udemy courses for offline use
  • Downloads HLS streams from a browser
